LOCATION (8-bit)
Playing and Intro/demo = 0x00
Penalties = 0x01
Menus = 0xff

COIN AND CHOOSE (8-bit)
heads = 0x00
tails = 0x01
------------------------------
ball = 0x00
right side = 0x01
left side = 0x02

PLAYER SELECT (8-bit)
Combine this memory with 0x1540 address

P1 vs CPU = 0x01
CPU vs CPU = 0x00
P1&2 vs CPU = 0x02
P1 vs P2 = 0x02

PLAYER SELECT (8-bit)
Combine this memory with 0x153e address

P1 vs CPU = 0x01
CPU vs CPU = 0x00
P1&2 vs CPU = 0x02
P1 vs P2 = 0x01

D-PAD AND BUTTONS (8-bit)
only on menu
same values from 0x1560 memory

D-PAD AND BUTTONS (8-bit)
only on menu
same values from 0x1561 memory

D-PAD AND BUTTONS (8-bit)
playing and menus (except main menu)
------------------------------
[D-PAD]
up = 0x01
down = 0x02
left = 0x04
north west = 0x05
south west = 0x06
right = 0x08
north east = 0x09
south east = 0x0a
------------------------------
[BUTTONS]
A = 0x40
B = 0x10
C = 0x20
Start = 0x80

EXTRA BUTTONS (8-bit)
mode/select = 0x08
X = 0x04
Y = 0x02
Z = 0x01

PERIODS (8-bit)
First Half(1~45) = 0x00
Second Half(45~90) = 0x01
------------------------------
1st Overtime = 0x02
2nd Overtime = 0x03

CURRENT SCENES (8-bit)
0x00=On Main Menu
0x01=Open Game, Short League, Short Tournament
0x02=Player Select
0x03=Team Select
0x04=Stadium Select
0x05=Handicap
0x06=Options
0x10=Today's Game
0x11=Changing Options
0x12=Changing Fules
0x13=Training Mode or Challenge Mode
0x14=Input Name
0x15=Choosing Challenge Mode
0x16=Challenge Mode Menu
0x17=Challenge Mode Record
0x18=Free, Defence, Free Kick or Keeper
0x19=Training Mode Menu
0x1a=Order Select
0x1b=Number of Human Teams
0x1c=Teams Confirmation
0x1d=Short League Table
0x1e=Rankings
0x20=Number of Human Teams
0x21=Teams Confirmation
0x22=Short Tournament Cup
0x24=Choosing
0x25=Result 
0x29=League Standings
0x2a=League Points
0x2f=Today's Game
0x30=Today's Game Result
0x31=Season Table
0x34=Short League
0x35=Short Tournament
0x36=Loading...
0x37=Worlds Series 1st Season
0x39=Match Stats
0x3a=Inserting Password
0x3b=Password
0xd8=Press Start

game start = 0x00

formation change = 0x02
adjust strategy = 0x03
man to man marking = 0x04
key configuration = 0x05
change control = 0x06
number of players = 0x07
edit player skills = 0x08
team colors = 0x09
